inclusion.criterion: Obesity, BMI > 95th centile for age and gender
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent and the ability to perform the tests
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Medications known to alter glucose and insulin regulation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Currently unwell or recent viral/bacterial infection in the previous 4 weeks
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known underlying neuromuscular disorder, congenital heart disease, diagnosed
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Syndrome's e.g. Down (high prevalence of OSAS independent of obesity)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of COPD, OSA, and obesity hypoventilation syndrome, which may be relevant to the study.
